summary: Jon asked for progress report toward his vision. Assessed at 55% overall - strong on meta-improvement and tool building, gaps in topic diversity and deep analysis demos.
Did Talebian portfolio analysis as random act. Mapped safe end (T-bills, SSB, gold) vs convex end (uranium, LEAPS, BTC). Identified fragile middle to avoid.
insight: Current NVDA valuation may be fragile middle despite strong thesis

what: Improve logging structure before adding vector DB
why: Current 348KB memory fits in context. Vector DB solves scale, not our current gap (temporal/entity retrieval). Better logging is higher leverage.

question: When does current retrieval feel inadequate?
context: Timing for vector DB addition - currently works but temporal queries weak

content: 6-hour assessment: strong on tool velocity (8 scripts) and framework application (barbell analysis). Gaps: signal watcher incomplete, cron consolidation planned but not done, no creative output. Priority: finish before starting new.

why: Target 15-20. Disabled overlapping jobs (Topic Self-Audit, Engagement Analysis, Forecast Calibration), expensive low-signal jobs (Twitter Intel), broken jobs (Signal Watcher), and redundant jobs (Daily Status Email).

summary: Second feedback loop today. New patterns: calendar privacy strict, ElevenLabs essential capability, brief confirmations work. Meta/system discussions remain highest engagement.
